name: Rune Evolution
storyline: You start a dragonling, new to the vibrant Mage Isles, in a world of might and magic. The isles are a dangerous place for a youngling, and you constantly need to flee to safety. Until one day, suddenly, you evolve, and find new strength to conquer your foes.
summary: Rune Evolution is a web-based arena style game, comprised of 10+ game modes rotating every 5 minutes. You collect sprites to evolve your character to be able to beat other players, while trying to collect rewards scattered on the map. Each game mode puts a spin on the game play. Although it's easy to get started, the battle for glory is more difficult. It currently has 5+ servers covering the world.
